title: Nine Inch Nails - Y34RZ3R0F4NR3M1X3D
description:
Release type:___Fan Remix Compilation
Date of release:___Jan 30th, 2008
Group:___Useless:C0mpilations
Individual:___foog

Album Title:___Y34RZ3R0F4NR4M1X3D
Artist:___Nine Inch Nails
Year:___2008

<a href="http://s25.photobucket.com/albums/c82/jojones88/?action=view&current=Y34RZ3R0F4NR3M1X3D.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c82/jojones88/Y34RZ3R0F4NR3M1X3D.jpg" border="0" alt="Photobucket"></a>

Tracks:

1. The Beginning of the End (remixed by CTV)
2. Vessel (Losing Control, by Pushing Reality)
3. Survivalism (Synth Death remix)
4. Me, I&#039;m Not (Void Mix)
5. God Given (Version 1, by the io Project)
6. The Great Destroyer (Destroyed, by Melodgic)
7. Another Version of the Truth (Saolis Mix, by James Dazell)
8. My Violent Heart (remixed)
9. The Greater Good (Version, by Dr p3ck3r Md)
10. Zero Sum (remixed)
11. In This Twilight (remixed)

Information:

	I&#039;m going to make it a tradition of putting together a remix compilation for every Nine Inch Nails album that is released. This is similar to the third release "Holding_On." The name of the album is a rip on the official remix album named "Y34RZ3R0R4M1X3D." 
	
	The tracks chosen came from ninremixes.com. I recommend going there and checking out some of the stuff that remix artists have made. These are my favorite tracks I could find of each song, so this is based solely on my personal opinion. People think I did a good job choosing the tracks the first time around so I am doing this again. Note that I am not the type of person that likes to put the same song on CD five times. These are 11 awesome fan remixes and the people who made these are very/extremely/super talented. Thanks guys and gals for making these tracks!

	The artwork was chosen was originally by redlinkmaster at echoingthesound.org. I just edited it a little bit. He did a great job on it so I chose it. 
	
Farewell: Hope you enjoy. This is the SIXTH release. 

Credits to: Everyone who was behind making these tracks. redlinkmaster for the artwork. 9inchnails.com for "The Limitless Potential" &#039;cause some of those tracks are on here.

Releases:
1_Guns N&#039; Roses - Appetite for Democracy
2_Metallica - "The New Album" (Live Bootlegs)
3_Nine Inch Nails - Holding_On
4_Trent Reznor/Peter Murphy - Radioshows
5_Red Hot Chili Peppers - Stadium Arcadium: Venus (B-Sides Compilation)
6_Nine Inch Nails - Y34RZ3R0F4NR3M1X3D

(foog release, nothing creative, but a shitty attempt to be)
